languages.text: {n}Сержант долго держит ваш взгляд, после чего с тяжелым вздохом опускает оружие.{/n} "Сказал бы мне это кто другой — рассмеялся бы и плюнул ему под ноги. Но вы — {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}герой Империума{/d}. Если хотя бы половина историй о ваших подвигах правда... Хорошо, я доверюсь вам, ваш высокобродие".

{n}The sergeant holds your gaze for a long moment, then with a heavy sigh he lowers his weapon.{/n} "If anyone else had said that to me, I would have laughed and spit at their feet. But you're a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}hero of the Imperium{/d}. If even half the stories of your exploits are true... Well, I will trust you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}."
languages.original_text: {n}Сержант долго держит ваш взгляд, после чего с тяжелым вздохом опускает оружие.{/n} "Сказал бы мне это кто другой — рассмеялся бы и плюнул ему под ноги. Но вы — {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}герой Империума{/d}. Если хотя бы половина историй о ваших подвигах правда... Хорошо, я доверюсь вам, ваш высокобродие".

But you're a hero of the Imperium. If even half the stories of your exploits are true... Well, I will trust you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}."

But you're a hero of the Imperium. If even half the stories of your exploits are true... Well, I will trust you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}."

{n}The sergeant holds your gaze for a long moment, then with a heavy sigh he lowers his weapon.{/n} "If anyone else had said that to me, I would have laughed and spit at their feet. But you're a hero of the Imperium. If even half the stories of your exploits are true... Well, I will trust you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}."

{n}The sergeant holds your gaze for a long moment, then with a heavy sigh he lowers his weapon.{/n} "If anyone else had said that to me, I would have laughed and spit at their feet. But you're a hero of the Imperium. If even half the stories of your exploits are true... Well, I will trust you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}."

languages.text: {n}马尔加军士凝视了你很长时间，之后重重地叹了口气，放下了武器。{/n}“如果换做别人对我说这种话，我会哈哈大笑，朝他们的脚上吐唾沫。可您是{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}帝国的英雄{/d}，只要您的那些英雄事迹有一半是真的……好吧，大人，我相信您，长官。”
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant holds your gaze for a long moment, then with a heavy sigh he lowers his weapon.{/n} "If anyone else had said that to me, I would have laughed and spit at their feet. But you're a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}hero of the Imperium{/d}. If even half the stories of your exploits are true... Well, I will trust you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}."

traits.locale_text: {n}马尔加军士凝视了你很长时间，之后重重地叹了口气，放下了武器。{/n}“如果换做别人对我说这种话，我会哈哈大笑，朝他们的脚上吐唾沫。可您是帝国的英雄，只要您的那些英雄事迹有一半是真的……好吧，大人，我相信您，长官。”

languages.text: {n}El sargento te mira fijamente, suspira y baja el arma.{/n} «Si eso me lo dijera cualquier otra persona, me habría reído y habría escupido a sus pies. Pero es usted un{mf||a} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}h{mf|éroe|eroína} del Imperium{/d}. Si la mitad de lo que dicen de sus acciones es cierto... Bueno, confío en usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}, señor{mf||a}».
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant holds your gaze for a long moment, then with a heavy sigh he lowers his weapon.{/n} "If anyone else had said that to me, I would have laughed and spit at their feet. But you're a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}hero of the Imperium{/d}. If even half the stories of your exploits are true... Well, I will trust you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}."

traits.locale_text: {n}El sargento te mira fijamente, suspira y baja el arma.{/n} «Si eso me lo dijera cualquier otra persona, me habría reído y habría escupido a sus pies. Pero es usted un{mf||a} h{mf|éroe|eroína} del Imperium. Si la mitad de lo que dicen de sus acciones es cierto... Bueno, confío en usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}, señor{mf||a}».

languages.text: {n}軍曹は長い間あなたの視線を受け止めた後、重いため息をついて武器を下ろした。{/n}「もし他の誰かが俺にそう言ったのなら、俺は笑ってそいつの足元に唾を吐いただろうよ。だが、あんたは{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}帝国の英雄{/d}だ。その活躍の噂が、半分でも本当なら…いいだろう、あんたを信じようじゃないか、陛下」
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant holds your gaze for a long moment, then with a heavy sigh he lowers his weapon.{/n} "If anyone else had said that to me, I would have laughed and spit at their feet. But you're a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}hero of the Imperium{/d}. If even half the stories of your exploits are true... Well, I will trust you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}."

traits.locale_text: {n}軍曹は長い間あなたの視線を受け止めた後、重いため息をついて武器を下ろした。{/n}「もし他の誰かが俺にそう言ったのなら、俺は笑ってそいつの足元に唾を吐いただろうよ。だが、あんたは帝国の英雄だ。その活躍の噂が、半分でも本当なら…いいだろう、あんたを信じようじゃないか、陛下」

languages.text: {n}Le sergent vous regarde droit dans les yeux un long moment, puis il pousse un soupir et baisse son arme.{/n} « Si vous n'étiez pas {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}{mf|un héros|une héroïne} de l'Imperium{/d}, je vous aurais probablement ri au nez avant de cracher à vos pieds. Mais si ce que l'on raconte sur vos exploits est vrai... alors j'accepte de vous faire confiance, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant holds your gaze for a long moment, then with a heavy sigh he lowers his weapon.{/n} "If anyone else had said that to me, I would have laughed and spit at their feet. But you're a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}hero of the Imperium{/d}. If even half the stories of your exploits are true... Well, I will trust you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sergent vous regarde droit dans les yeux un long moment, puis il pousse un soupir et baisse son arme.{/n} « Si vous n'étiez pas {mf|un héros|une héroïne} de l'Imperium, je vous aurais probablement ri au nez avant de cracher à vos pieds. Mais si ce que l'on raconte sur vos exploits est vrai... alors j'accepte de vous faire confiance, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}Der Sergeant hält deinem Blick einen Augenblick lang stand, dann senkt er mit einem schweren Seufzen die Waffe.{/n} "Hätte irgendjemand anders das zu mir gesagt, hätte ich gelacht und ihm vor die Füße gespuckt. Doch Ihr seid {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}{mf|ein Held|eine Heldin} des Imperiums{/d}. Wenn auch nur die Hälfte der Geschichten von Euren Taten stimmt ... Nun, ich vertraue Euch, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant holds your gaze for a long moment, then with a heavy sigh he lowers his weapon.{/n} "If anyone else had said that to me, I would have laughed and spit at their feet. But you're a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}hero of the Imperium{/d}. If even half the stories of your exploits are true... Well, I will trust you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Sergeant hält deinem Blick einen Augenblick lang stand, dann senkt er mit einem schweren Seufzen die Waffe.{/n} "Hätte irgendjemand anders das zu mir gesagt, hätte ich gelacht und ihm vor die Füße gespuckt. "Doch Ihr seid {mf|ein Held|eine Heldin} des Imperiums. Wenn auch nur die Hälfte der Geschichten von Euren Taten stimmt ... Nun, ich vertraue Euch, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: {n}Çavuş, epeyce bir süre gözlerini senden ayırmıyor, derken derin bir iç çekerek silahını indiriyor.{/n} "Bunu bir başkasından duysam önce güler, sonra ayaklarına tükürürdüm. Ancak karşımda bir {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}İmparatorluk kahramanı{/d} var. Sizinle ilgili anlatılanların yarısı bile gerçekse... Size güvenim tamdır {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant holds your gaze for a long moment, then with a heavy sigh he lowers his weapon.{/n} "If anyone else had said that to me, I would have laughed and spit at their feet. But you're a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}hero of the Imperium{/d}. If even half the stories of your exploits are true... Well, I will trust you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Çavuş, epeyce bir süre gözlerini senden ayırmıyor, ardından da derin bir iç çekerek silahını indiriyor.{/n} "Bunu bir başkasından duysam önce güler, sonra ayaklarına tükürürdüm. Ancak karşımda İmparatorluk'un kahramanı var. Başarılarınızla ilgili anlatılanların yarısı bile gerçekse... Size güveniyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."

{n}Çavuş, epeyce bir süre gözlerini senden ayırmıyor, derken derin bir iç çekerek silahını indiriyor.{/n} "Bunu bir başkasından duysam önce güler, sonra ayaklarına tükürürdüm. Ancak karşımda bir İmparatorluk kahramanı var. Sizinle ilgili anlatılanların yarısı bile gerçekse... Size güvenim tamdır {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
